page.title: 14ENGLISH CHINA CLAY GROUP
page.content: { English China Clay Group}is one of the largest{paving}and{walling block manufacturers around{Britain.}The firm started as a{gravel pit.}It makes many different varietys of{blocks}for purposes.The materials used to make the{concrete blocks}are{fly ash,cement {sand,aggregate,gravel}and{water.}The majority of the materials used come from{local areas.}The site covers between{70}and{75 acres,}and it has expanded over the years.To cope with the orders for the blocks they employ {fourteen hundred men}who work two shifts:from{6.30 am}to{3.00 pm}and from{2.45 pm}to{2.am.}The busiest time of the year is{Summer}so they stock up in the{Winter.
